original_text: Abimelech said, “What is this you have done to us? One of the people might easily have lain with your wife, and you would have brought guilt upon us.”
korean_text: 아비멜렉이 이르되 네가 어찌 우리에게 이렇게 행하였느냐 백성 중 하나가 네 아내와 동침할 뻔하였도다 네가 죄를 우리에게 입혔으리라

sentences.original_text: What is this you have done to us?
One of the people might easily have lain with your wife,
sentences.korean_translation: 백성 중 하나가 네 아내와 동침하기를 쉬웠을 것이라,

sentences.original_text: and you would have brought guilt upon us.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 네가 우리에게 죄를 가져왔을 것이니라.
